Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Research. Limit the output to 100 words. In simpler terms, 'Nutrition' is what you eat and drink. It's the food and fluids that your body needs to stay healthy. Think of it like fuel for a car. The right nutrition helps your body grow, develop, and work properly. It gives you energy to play, learn, and do all the things you love. But, not all foods are equally good for you. Some are rich in nutrients, like fruits and vegetables, while others have little to no nutritional value, like candy. So, it's important to choose a variety of nutritious foods to keep your body strong and healthy.
